Source for file Excel5.php

Documentation is available at Excel5.php

  1. <?php
  2. /**
  3.  * PHPExcel
  4.  *
  5.  * Copyright (c) 2006 - 2009 PHPExcel
  6.  *
  7.  * This library is free software; you can redistribute it and/or
  8.  * modify it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public
  9.  * License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either
  10.  * version 2.1 of the License, or (at your option) any later version.
  11.  *
  12.  * This library is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
  13.  * but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
  14.  * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU
  15.  * Lesser General Public License for more details.
  16.  *
  17.  * You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public
  18.  * License along with this library; if not, write to the Free Software
  19.  * Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA  02110-1301  USA
  20.  *
  21.  * @category   PHPExcel
  22.  * @package    PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5
  23.  * @copyright  Copyright (c) 2006 - 2009 PHPExcel (http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel)
  24.  * @license    http://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/lgpl-2.1.txt    LGPL
  25.  * @version    1.6.5, 2009-01-05
  26.  */
  27.  
  28.  
  29. /** PHPExcel_IWriter */
  30. require_once 'PHPExcel/Writer/IWriter.php';
  31.  
  32. /** PHPExcel_Cell */
  33. require_once 'PHPExcel/Cell.php';
  34.  
  35. /** PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5_Workbook */
  36. require_once 'PHPExcel/Writer/Excel5/Workbook.php';
  37.  
  38. /** PHPExcel_RichText */
  39. require_once 'PHPExcel/RichText.php';
  40.  
  41. /** PHPExcel_HashTable */
  42. require_once 'PHPExcel/HashTable.php';
  43.  
  44.  
  45. /**
  46.  * PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5
  47.  *
  48.  * @category   PHPExcel
  49.  * @package    PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5
  50.  * @copyright  Copyright (c) 2006 - 2009 PHPExcel (http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel)
  51.  */
  52. class PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5 implements PHPExcel_Writer_IWriter {
  53.     /**
  54.      * PHPExcel object
  55.      *
  56.      * @var PHPExcel 
  57.      */
  58.     private $_phpExcel;
  59.  
  60.     /**
  61.      * Temporary storage directory
  62.      *
  63.      * @var string 
  64.      */
  65.     private $_tempDir = '';
  66.  
  67.     /**
  68.      * Color cache
  69.      */
  70.     private $_colors = array();
  71.  
  72.     /**
  73.      * Create a new PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5
  74.      *
  75.      * @param    PHPExcel    $phpExcel    PHPExcel object
  76.      */
  77.     public function __construct(PHPExcel $phpExcel) {
  78.         $this->_phpExcel    = $phpExcel;
  79.         $this->_tempDir        = '';
  80.         $this->_colors        = array();
  81.     }
  82.  
  83.     /**
  84.      * Save PHPExcel to file
  85.      *
  86.      * @param    string        $pFileName 
  87.      * @throws    Exception
  88.      */
  89.     public function save($pFilename = null) {
  90.  
  91.         // check for iconv support
  92.         if (!function_exists('iconv')) {
  93.             throw new Exception("Cannot write .xls file without PHP support for iconv");
  94.         }
  95.  
  96.         $this->_colors        = array();
  97.  
  98.         $phpExcel = $this->_phpExcel;
  99.         $workbook = new PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5_Workbook($pFilename, $phpExcel);
  100.         $workbook->setVersion(8);
  101.  
  102.         // Set temp dir
  103.         if ($this->_tempDir != '') {
  104.             $workbook->setTempDir($this->_tempDir);
  105.         }
  106.  
  107.         $saveDateReturnType = PHPExcel_Calculation_Functions::getReturnDateType();
  108.         PHPExcel_Calculation_Functions::setReturnDateType(PHPExcel_Calculation_Functions::RETURNDATE_EXCEL);
  109.  
  110.         // Add empty sheets
  111.         foreach ($phpExcel->getSheetNames() as $sheetIndex => $sheetName) {
  112.             $phpSheet  = $phpExcel->getSheet($sheetIndex);
  113.             $worksheet = $workbook->addWorksheet($sheetName, $phpSheet);
  114.         }
  115.         $allWorksheets = $workbook->worksheets();
  116.  
  117.         $formats = array();
  118.  
  119.         // Add full sheet data
  120.         foreach ($phpExcel->getSheetNames() as $sheetIndex => $sheetName) {
  121.             $phpSheet  = $phpExcel->getSheet($sheetIndex);
  122.             $worksheet = $allWorksheets[$sheetIndex];
  123.             
  124.             // Default style
  125.             $emptyStyle = $phpSheet->getDefaultStyle();
  126.  
  127.             $aStyles = $phpSheet->getStyles();
  128.             
  129.             // Calculate cell style hashes
  130.             $cellStyleHashes = new PHPExcel_HashTable();
  131.             $aStyles = $phpSheet->getStyles();
  132.             $cellStyleHashes->addFromSource( $aStyles );
  133.  
  134.             $addedStyles = array();
  135.             foreach ($aStyles as $style) {
  136.                 $styleHashIndex = $style->getHashIndex();
  137.  
  138.                 if(isset($addedStyles[$styleHashIndex])) continue;
  139.                 
  140.                 $formats[$styleHashIndex] = $workbook->addFormat(array(
  141.                     'HAlign' => $style->getAlignment()->getHorizontal(),
  142.                     'VAlign' => $this->_mapVAlign($style->getAlignment()->getVertical()),
  143.                     'TextRotation' => $style->getAlignment()->getTextRotation(),
  144.  
  145.                     'Bold' => $style->getFont()->getBold(),
  146.                     'FontFamily' => $style->getFont()->getName(),
  147.                     'Color' => $this->_addColor($workbook, $style->getFont()->getColor()->getRGB()),
  148.                     'Underline' => $this->_mapUnderline($style->getFont()->getUnderline()),
  149.                     'Size' => $style->getFont()->getSize(),
  150.                     //~ 'Script' => $style->getSuperscript(),
  151.  
  152.                     'NumFormat' => $style->getNumberFormat()->getFormatCode(),
  153.  
  154.                     'Bottom' => $this->_mapBorderStyle($style->getBorders()->getBottom()->getBorderStyle()),
  155.                     'Top' => $this->_mapBorderStyle($style->getBorders()->getTop()->getBorderStyle()),
  156.                     'Left' => $this->_mapBorderStyle($style->getBorders()->getLeft()->getBorderStyle()),
  157.                     'Right' => $this->_mapBorderStyle($style->getBorders()->getRight()->getBorderStyle()),
  158.                     'BottomColor' => $this->_addColor($workbook, $style->getBorders()->getBottom()->getColor()->getRGB()),
  159.                     'TopColor' => $this->_addColor($workbook, $style->getBorders()->getTop()->getColor()->getRGB()),
  160.                     'RightColor' => $this->_addColor($workbook, $style->getBorders()->getRight()->getColor()->getRGB()),
  161.                     'LeftColor' => $this->_addColor($workbook, $style->getBorders()->getLeft()->getColor()->getRGB()),
  162.  
  163.                     'FgColor' => $this->_addColor($workbook, $style->getFill()->getStartColor()->getRGB()),
  164.                     'BgColor' => $this->_addColor($workbook, $style->getFill()->getEndColor()->getRGB()),
  165.                     'Pattern' => $this->_mapFillType($style->getFill()->getFillType()),
  166.  
  167.                 ));
  168.                 if ($style->getAlignment()->getWrapText()) {
  169.                     $formats[$styleHashIndex]->setTextWrap();
  170.                 }
  171.                 $formats[$styleHashIndex]->setIndent($style->getAlignment()->getIndent());
  172.                 if ($style->getAlignment()->getShrinkToFit()) {
  173.                     $formats[$styleHashIndex]->setShrinkToFit();
  174.                 }
  175.                 if ($style->getFont()->getItalic()) {
  176.                     $formats[$styleHashIndex]->setItalic();
  177.                 }
  178.                 if ($style->getFont()->getStriketrough()) {
  179.                     $formats[$styleHashIndex]->setStrikeOut();
  180.                 }
  181.                 if ($style->getProtection()->getLocked() == PHPExcel_Style_Protection::PROTECTION_UNPROTECTED) {
  182.                     $formats[$styleHashIndex]->setUnlocked();
  183.                 }
  184.                 if ($style->getProtection()->getHidden() == PHPExcel_Style_Protection::PROTECTION_PROTECTED) {
  185.                     $formats[$styleHashIndex]->setHidden();
  186.                 }
  187.                 
  188.                 $addedStyles[$style->getHashIndex()] = true;
  189.             }
  190.  
  191.             // Active sheet
  192.             if ($sheetIndex == $phpExcel->getActiveSheetIndex()) {
  193.                 $worksheet->activate();
  194.             }
  195.  
  196.             // initialize first, last, row and column index, needed for DIMENSION record
  197.             $firstRowIndex = 0;
  198.             $lastRowIndex = -1;
  199.             $firstColumnIndex = 0;
  200.             $lastColumnIndex = -1;
  201.  
  202.             foreach ($phpSheet->getCellCollection() as $cell) {
  203.                 $row = $cell->getRow() - 1;
  204.                 $column = PHPExcel_Cell::columnIndexFromString($cell->getColumn()) - 1;
  205.  
  206.                 // Don't break Excel!
  207.                 if ($row + 1 >= 65569) {
  208.                     break;
  209.                 }
  210.  
  211.                 $firstRowIndex = min($firstRowIndex, $row);
  212.                 $lastRowIndex = max($lastRowIndex, $row);
  213.                 $firstColumnIndex = min($firstColumnIndex, $column);
  214.                 $lastColumnIndex = max($lastColumnIndex, $column);
  215.  
  216.                 $style = $emptyStyle;
  217.                 if (isset($aStyles[$cell->getCoordinate()])) {
  218.                     $style = $aStyles[$cell->getCoordinate()];
  219.                 }
  220.                 $styleHashIndex = $style->getHashIndex();
  221.  
  222.                 // Write cell value
  223.                 if ($cell->getValue() instanceof PHPExcel_RichText) {
  224.                     $worksheet->write($row, $column, $cell->getValue()->getPlainText(), $formats[$styleHashIndex]);
  225.                 } else {
  226.                     switch ($cell->getDatatype()) {
  227.  
  228.                     case PHPExcel_Cell_DataType::TYPE_STRING:
  229.                         if ($cell->getValue() === '' or $cell->getValue() === null) {
  230.                             $worksheet->writeBlank($row, $column, $formats[$styleHashIndex]);
  231.                         } else {
  232.                             $worksheet->writeString($row, $column, $cell->getValue(), $formats[$styleHashIndex]);
  233.                         }
  234.                         break;
  235.  
  236.                     case PHPExcel_Cell_DataType::TYPE_FORMULA:
  237.                         $worksheet->writeFormula($row, $column, $cell->getValue(), $formats[$styleHashIndex]);
  238.                         break;
  239.  
  240.                     case PHPExcel_Cell_DataType::TYPE_BOOL:
  241.                         $worksheet->writeBoolErr($row, $column, $cell->getValue(), 0, $formats[$styleHashIndex]);
  242.                         break;
  243.  
  244.                     case PHPExcel_Cell_DataType::TYPE_ERROR:
  245.                         $worksheet->writeBoolErr($row, $column, $this->_mapErrorCode($cell->getValue()), 1, $formats[$styleHashIndex]);
  246.                         break;
  247.  
  248.                     default:
  249.                         $worksheet->write($row, $column, $cell->getValue(), $formats[$styleHashIndex], $style->getNumberFormat()->getFormatCode());
  250.                         break;
  251.                     }
  252.  
  253.                     // Hyperlink?
  254.                     if ($cell->hasHyperlink()) {
  255.                         $worksheet->writeUrl($row, $column, str_replace('sheet://', 'internal:', $cell->getHyperlink()->getUrl()));
  256.                     }
  257.                 }
  258.             }
  259.  
  260.             // set the worksheet dimension for the DIMENSION record
  261.             $worksheet->setDimensions($firstRowIndex, $lastRowIndex, $firstColumnIndex, $lastColumnIndex);
  262.  
  263.             $phpSheet->calculateColumnWidths();
  264.  
  265.             // Column dimensions
  266.             foreach ($phpSheet->getColumnDimensions() as $columnDimension) {
  267.                 $column = PHPExcel_Cell::columnIndexFromString($columnDimension->getColumnIndex()) - 1;
  268.                 if ($column < 256) {
  269.                     if ($columnDimension->getWidth() >= 0) {
  270.                         $width = $columnDimension->getWidth();
  271.                     } else if ($phpSheet->getDefaultColumnDimension()->getWidth() >= 0) {
  272.                         $width = $phpSheet->getDefaultColumnDimension()->getWidth();
  273.                     } else {
  274.                         $width = 8;
  275.                     }
  276.                     $worksheet->setColumn( $column, $column, $width, null, ($columnDimension->getVisible() ? '0' : '1'), $columnDimension->getOutlineLevel());
  277.                 }
  278.             }
  279.  
  280.             // Row dimensions
  281.             foreach ($phpSheet->getRowDimensions() as $rowDimension) {
  282.                 $worksheet->setRow( $rowDimension->getRowIndex() - 1, $rowDimension->getRowHeight(), null, ($rowDimension->getVisible() ? '0' : '1'), $rowDimension->getOutlineLevel() );
  283.             }
  284.  
  285.             foreach ($phpSheet->getDrawingCollection() as $drawing) {
  286.                 list($column, $row) = PHPExcel_Cell::coordinateFromString($drawing->getCoordinates());
  287.  
  288.                 if ($drawing instanceof PHPExcel_Worksheet_Drawing) {
  289.                     $filename = $drawing->getPath();
  290.                     list($imagesx, $imagesy, $imageFormat) = getimagesize($filename);
  291.                     switch ($imageFormat) {
  292.                         case 1: $image = imagecreatefromgif($filename); break;
  293.                         case 2: $image = imagecreatefromjpeg($filename); break;
  294.                         case 3: $image = imagecreatefrompng($filename); break;
  295.                         default: continue 2;
  296.                     }
  297.                 } else if ($drawing instanceof PHPExcel_Worksheet_MemoryDrawing) {
  298.                     $image = $drawing->getImageResource();
  299.                     $imagesx = imagesx($image);
  300.                     $imagesy = imagesy($image);
  301.                 }
  302.  
  303.                 $worksheet->insertBitmap($row - 1, PHPExcel_Cell::columnIndexFromString($column) - 1, $image, $drawing->getOffsetX(), $drawing->getOffsetY(), $drawing->getWidth() / $imagesx, $drawing->getHeight() / $imagesy);
  304.             }
  305.         }
  306.  
  307.         PHPExcel_Calculation_Functions::setReturnDateType($saveDateReturnType);
  308.  
  309.         $workbook->close();
  310.     }
  311.  
  312.     /**
  313.      * Add color
  314.      */
  315.     private function _addColor($workbook, $rgb) {
  316.         if (!isset($this->_colors[$rgb])) {
  317.             $workbook->setCustomColor(8 + count($this->_colors), hexdec(substr($rgb, 0, 2)), hexdec(substr($rgb, 2, 2)), hexdec(substr($rgb, 4)));
  318.             $this->_colors[$rgb] = 8 + count($this->_colors);
  319.         }
  320.         return $this->_colors[$rgb];
  321.     }
  322.  
  323.     /**
  324.      * Map border style
  325.      */
  326.     private function _mapBorderStyle($borderStyle) {
  327.         switch ($borderStyle) {
  328.             case PHPExcel_Style_Border::BORDER_NONE:                return 0x00;
  329.             case PHPExcel_Style_Border::BORDER_THIN;                return 0x01;
  330.             case PHPExcel_Style_Border::BORDER_MEDIUM;                return 0x02;
  331.             case PHPExcel_Style_Border::BORDER_DASHED;                return 0x03;
  332.             case PHPExcel_Style_Border::BORDER_DOTTED;                return 0x04;
  333.             case PHPExcel_Style_Border::BORDER_THICK;                return 0x05;
  334.             case PHPExcel_Style_Border::BORDER_DOUBLE;                return 0x06;
  335.             case PHPExcel_Style_Border::BORDER_HAIR;                return 0x07;
  336.             case PHPExcel_Style_Border::BORDER_MEDIUMDASHED;        return 0x08;
  337.             case PHPExcel_Style_Border::BORDER_DASHDOT;                return 0x09;
  338.             case PHPExcel_Style_Border::BORDER_MEDIUMDASHDOT;        return 0x0A;
  339.             case PHPExcel_Style_Border::BORDER_DASHDOTDOT;            return 0x0B;
  340.             case PHPExcel_Style_Border::BORDER_MEDIUMDASHDOTDOT;    return 0x0C;
  341.             case PHPExcel_Style_Border::BORDER_SLANTDASHDOT;        return 0x0D;
  342.             default:                                                return 0x00;
  343.         }
  344.     }
  345.  
  346.     /**
  347.      * Map underline
  348.      */
  349.     private function _mapUnderline($underline) {
  350.         switch ($underline) {
  351.             case PHPExcel_Style_Font::UNDERLINE_NONE:
  352.                 return 0;
  353.             case PHPExcel_Style_Font::UNDERLINE_SINGLE:
  354.                 return 1;
  355.             case PHPExcel_Style_Font::UNDERLINE_DOUBLE:
  356.                 return 2;
  357.             case PHPExcel_Style_Font::UNDERLINE_SINGLEACCOUNTING:
  358.                 return 0x21;
  359.             case PHPExcel_Style_Font::UNDERLINE_DOUBLEACCOUNTING:
  360.                 return 0x22;
  361.             default:
  362.                 return 0; // map others to none
  363.         }
  364.     }
  365.  
  366.     /**
  367.      * Map fill type
  368.      */
  369.     private function _mapFillType($fillType) {
  370.         switch ($fillType) {
  371.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_NONE:                    return 0x00;
  372.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_SOLID:                    return 0x01;
  373.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_PATTERN_MEDIUMGRAY:        return 0x02;
  374.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_PATTERN_DARKGRAY:        return 0x03;
  375.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_PATTERN_LIGHTGRAY:        return 0x04;
  376.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_PATTERN_DARKHORIZONTAL:    return 0x05;
  377.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_PATTERN_DARKVERTICAL:    return 0x06;
  378.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_PATTERN_DARKDOWN:        return 0x07;
  379.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_PATTERN_DARKUP:            return 0x08;
  380.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_PATTERN_DARKGRID:        return 0x09;
  381.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_PATTERN_DARKTRELLIS:        return 0x0A;
  382.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_PATTERN_LIGHTHORIZONTAL:    return 0x0B;
  383.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_PATTERN_LIGHTVERTICAL:    return 0x0C;
  384.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_PATTERN_LIGHTDOWN:        return 0x0D;
  385.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_PATTERN_LIGHTUP:            return 0x0E;
  386.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_PATTERN_LIGHTGRID:        return 0x0F;
  387.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_PATTERN_LIGHTTRELLIS:    return 0x10;
  388.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_PATTERN_GRAY125:            return 0x11;
  389.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_PATTERN_GRAY0625:        return 0x12;
  390.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_GRADIENT_LINEAR:        // does not exist in BIFF8
  391.             case PHPExcel_Style_Fill::FILL_GRADIENT_PATH:        // does not exist in BIFF8
  392.             default:                                                return 0x00;
  393.         }
  394.     }
  395.  
  396.     /**
  397.      * Map VAlign
  398.      */
  399.     private function _mapVAlign($vAlign) {
  400.         return ($vAlign == 'center' || $vAlign == 'justify' ? 'v' : '') . $vAlign;
  401.     }
  402.  
  403.     /**
  404.      * Map Error code
  405.      */
  406.     private function _mapErrorCode($errorCode) {
  407.         switch ($errorCode) {
  408.             case '#NULL!':    return 0x00;
  409.             case '#DIV/0!':    return 0x07;
  410.             case '#VALUE!':    return 0x0F;
  411.             case '#REF!':    return 0x17;
  412.             case '#NAME?':    return 0x1D;
  413.             case '#NUM!':    return 0x24;
  414.             case '#N/A':    return 0x2A;
  415.         }
  416.  
  417.         return 0;
  418.     }
  419.  
  420.     /**
  421.      * Get an array of all styles
  422.      *
  423.      * @param    PHPExcel                $pPHPExcel 
  424.      * @return    PHPExcel_Style[]        All styles in PHPExcel
  425.      * @throws    Exception
  426.      */
  427.     private function _allStyles(PHPExcel $pPHPExcel = null)
  428.     {
  429.         // Get an array of all styles
  430.         $aStyles        = array();
  431.  
  432.         for ($i = 0; $i < $pPHPExcel->getSheetCount(); ++$i) {
  433.             foreach ($pPHPExcel->getSheet($i)->getStyles() as $style) {
  434.                 $aStyles[] = $style;
  435.             }
  436.         }
  437.  
  438.         return $aStyles;
  439.     }
  440.  
  441.     /**
  442.      * Get temporary storage directory
  443.      *
  444.      * @return string 
  445.      */
  446.     public function getTempDir() {
  447.         return $this->_tempDir;
  448.     }
  449.  
  450.     /**
  451.      * Set temporary storage directory
  452.      *
  453.      * @param    string    $pValue        Temporary storage directory
  454.      * @throws    Exception    Exception when directory does not exist
  455.      */
  456.     public function setTempDir($pValue = '') {
  457.         if (is_dir($pValue)) {
  458.             $this->_tempDir = $pValue;
  459.         } else {
  460.             throw new Exception("Directory does not exist: $pValue");
  461.         }
  462.     }
  463. }
Documentation generated on Mon, 05 Jan 2009 20:36:56 +0100 by phpDocumentor 1.4.1
